product_name: Merrell Orland Insulated Reversible Shirt Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Think being warm means wearing your puffiest down layer? The Merrell Orland insulated reversible shirt offers a slim profileand warmth thanks to synthetic insulation that traps body heat without bulk. Opti-Warm(TM) synthetic insulation offers lightweight warmth that continues to insulate when wet; polyester fabric slides easily over base layers and under rainwear. Keep the fun on the inside or reverse the shirt to show off its black plaid pattern. Merrell Orland insulated reversible shirt features a button-front closure with collar and chest pockets. Closeout.
